class.name: AimModifier3D
class.brief_description: The [AimModifier3D] rotates a bone to look at a reference bone.
class.description: This is a simple version of [LookAtModifier3D] that only allows bone to the reference without advanced options such as angle limitation or time-based interpolation. The feature is simplified, but instead it is implemented with smooth tracking without euler, see [method set_use_euler].

method.name: get_forward_axis
method.description: Returns the forward axis of the bone.

method.name: get_primary_rotation_axis
method.description: Returns the axis of the first rotation. It is enabled only if [method is_using_euler] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: is_relative
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the relative option is enabled in the setting at [param index].

method.name: is_using_euler
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if it provides rotation with using euler.

method.name: is_using_secondary_rotation
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if it provides rotation by two axes. It is enabled only if [method is_using_euler] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_forward_axis
method.description: Sets the forward axis of the bone.

method.name: set_primary_rotation_axis
method.description: Sets the axis of the first rotation. It is enabled only if [method is_using_euler] is [code]true[/code].

method.name: set_relative
method.description: Sets relative option in the setting at [param index] to [param enabled]. If sets [param enabled] to [code]true[/code], the rotation is applied relative to the pose. If sets [param enabled] to [code]false[/code], the rotation is applied relative to the rest. It means to replace the current pose with the [AimModifier3D]'s result.

method.name: set_use_euler
method.description: If sets [param enabled] to [code]true[/code], it provides rotation with using euler. If sets [param enabled] to [code]false[/code], it provides rotation with using rotation by arc generated from the forward axis vector and the vector toward the reference.

method.name: set_use_secondary_rotation
method.description: If sets [param enabled] to [code]true[/code], it provides rotation by two axes. It is enabled only if [method is_using_euler] is [code]true[/code].

members.member: The number of settings in the modifier.
